Name: Cure
Description: This spell cures any diseases you may encounter.

Name: Energy Barrier
Description: This spell creates a strong magical shield around your character, protecting them from a large amount of incoming damage.

Name: Energy Blast
Description: This spell launches a blast of pure magical energy at your opponent.

Name: Fire Bolt
Description: This spell launches magical fire at your opponent.

Name: Fireball
Description: This spell launches a large ball of magical fire at your opponent.

Name: Heal Major Wounds
Description: This spell restores a large amount of health to your character.

Name: Heal Medium Wounds
Description: This spell restores a medium amount of health to your character.

Name: Ice Bolt
Description: This spell launches magical ice at your opponent.

Name: Lightning Bolt
Description: This spell blasts a bolt of lightning at your opponent.

Name: Shield
Description: This spell creates a magical shield around your character, protecting them from some incoming damage.

Name: Smite
Description: This spell deals holy magic damage against your opponent.

Name: Triple Arrow
Description: This spell creates 3 magical arrows which fly at your target.
